rooms.description: North-facing entrance hall with minimal storage and a direct path to the central courtyard. Complies with Vastu by ensuring clear flow of energy.
Spacious living room adjacent to the entrance hall, featuring ample natural light and a view of the courtyard. Designed for comfort and family gatherings.
Dining area adjoining the living room, ensuring open connectivity. Vastu principles are observed by aligning with the east to promote auspiciousness.
Modern kitchen with integrated storage and ventilation, positioned to maintain a balance between work areas and relaxation zones. Designed to ensure smooth workflow in line with Vastu guidelines.
Custom-designed home theater with soundproofing and dedicated seating area. Located in a quiet section of the townhouse to minimize external noise interference.
Master bedroom located near the courtyard for natural light and ventilation. Features an ensuite bathroom and walk-in closet.
Additional bedroom with access to common areas and a window for natural light. Designed in line with Vastu by being centrally located.
Third bedroom designed for children or guests, ensuring privacy while maintaining connectivity with the rest of the house.
Fourth bedroom providing extra space and a quiet retreat. Placement ensures positive energy flow as per Vastu.
Fifth bedroom optimized for storage and relaxation, integrated with natural light.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligning with the Vastu principle of a north-facing entry to invite prosperity.
Large window allowing ample natural light into the living room while balancing energy flow.
Window aligned with east for auspiciousness and energy balance.
Window to ensure ventilation and light in the kitchen while adhering to Vastu principles.

courtyard.description: Central courtyard providing natural ventilation, abundant daylight and a serene gathering space. Complies with traditional Indian architectural aesthetics.
